MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G64 postcode area of Bishopbriggs. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30am due to an underground cable fault near Belvidere Crescent and Hillside Drive. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:06am on Friday, 05 February 2021
